info.name: JEP 478 - Key Derivation Function API (Preview)
info.dscr: A preview of the KDF API. The final implementation is in JEP 510 for Java 25.

info.name: JEP 485 - Stream Gatherers
info.dscr: Enhance the Stream API to support custom intermediate operations. This will allow stream pipelines to transform data in ways that are not easily achievable with the existing built-in intermediate operations.
